item.title: Simply smile to make your payment at this KFC restaurant in China
item.description: A new, digitally connected experience for professionals living in urban areas. For the first time in the world, consumers can pay using facial recognition technology. Yum China Holdings, which owns KFC, has launched a new restaurant concept, KPRO by KFC, in Hangzhou, China â€“ the same city where Alibaba is headquartered. Designed for savvy diners who enjoy trying new things, KPRO offers a fresh and seasonal menu. Using digital technology, it provides an immersive dining experience.
